basic.description: This course is application-based and provides students with the opportunity to develop a complete Integrated Marketing Communication campaign plan as part of the National Student Advertising Competition sponsored by the American Advertising Federation. The course is set up as hierarchy-based advertising agency with some students in leadership positions and others working in departments that are managed by student directors. May be repeated to a maximum of six semester hours.
basic.subject: ADV
basic.title: Advertising Team I
